title: Rainbow at Dusk
description: Major Vance Trent literally drops from the sky to disrupt life at Karrisbrooke Plantation. Breaking his ankle when he lands his parachute, he now has a splendid excuse to remain. His orders are to detect any irregularities in the management of the flourishing cotton mills, which are filling defense orders for drill cotton. Jessamine Ramsay is in North Carolina staying with her elderly aunt, Ellen Marshall, owner of the Marshall Cotton Mills. She is there as a companion to her aunt, not to be lured into intrigue and treason by the dashing, romantic major. However, fate and Aunt Ellen have other plans ...
author: Emilie Loring
